name: Fill the Maze
description:
Play a new and exciting maze puzzle game for FREE!
You would be amazed If you played the game at least once.
It looks easy, but not that easy.

You only need one finger to play this game.
Fill all areas within the maze by swiping up, down, left, and right.
If you hit the bomb with a splat, you have to run away.
Get a variety of cubes including cheese, aqua, sharks, blocks, desserts, etc.

[Features of "Fill the Maze"]
- Simple operation of swiping
- Various and unique puzzle levels
- Colorful and adorable characters
- Best time killier
- Free games
- Offline play available
